1112670.name: Yet Another Waveshooter
1112670.description:
Yet Another Waveshooter is a waveshooter in three epochs (fantasy, present, and future). Defend yourself against never ending waves of enemies with increasing difficulty until you die. After death, you will be transported to the next level. Engage in an immersive experience with anit-motionsickness movement to gain the top score.

Press (A) to reload.
Set graphic settings to "high" for enabling voluminetric lightning.

Update v5.0:
Enhanced Graphics
Added Voluminetric Lightning. Set graphic settings to "high" for enabling it.
Fixed dozens of smaller bugs
Added reload function. Press (A) to reload.

ToDo:

fix leafs in lvl 1.2
fix golem in lvl 1.1
muzzle flash

Don't play if you have got epilepsy.

Please tell me if there is anything to change.
